name: Harpie's Pet Baby Dragon
text:
Gains effects based on the number of "Harpie" monsters you control, except "Harpie's Pet Baby Dragon".
● 1+: Your opponent cannot target "Harpie" monsters you control for attacks, except "Harpie's Pet Baby Dragon".
● 2+: Double the original ATK/DEF of this card.
● 3+: Once per turn: You can target 1 card your opponent controls; destroy that target.
